DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date when the adverse event resolved/ended represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2021-6-8 ak 12 Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 11/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT changed max length. 11/9/18 TT changed Data Type from Character to Date and added Max Length for NCI Implementation of the standard. Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.21.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the date that the AE resolved using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).  If the AE is ongoing, leave the field blank.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The definition of resolved is sponsor specific. The preferred method is to collect a complete end date (if applicable). Partial dates (e.g., providing year only or month and year only) may be acceptable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: AEENDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH END DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable AEENDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the adverse event en
